thread.title: Aditya Chopra begins prep for 'Befikre' in Paris
thread.title_full: Aditya Chopra begins prep for 'Befikre' in Paris

author: PTI
title: Aditya Chopra begins prep for 'Befikre' in Paris
text:
PTI | October 21, 2015, 18.48 pm Mumbai: Aditya Chopra is making his directorial comeback with 'Befikre' and the filmmaker has began prepping for the movie in Paris.
The film, starring Ranveer Singh and Vaani Kapoor, has gone on pre-production on October 20, exactly 20 years after Aditya made his directorial debut with 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayeinge' in 1995.
"It was on this day 20 years ago that Aditya Chopra's debut movie released and on this very day exactly 20 years later the official prep work for Aditya Chopra's next #Befikre began in Paris. What a coincidence of timing of this exact date!" a post read on Yash Raj Films' official Facebook page.
20th October, 2015: It was on this day 20 years ago that Aditya Chopra's debut movie released and on this very day...
Posted by Yash Raj Films on Wednesday, October 21, 2015 'Befikre' was announced by Aditya in a special note on father Yash Chopra's 83rd birth anniversary on September 27.
